The casualty count helps put the ongoing debate about journalistic neutrality into a sharper light .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The 600 journalists embedded with American troops in Iraq will be threatened by the same fire as the troops they are covering .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER|U-GPE O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O

And I think all plans must be anchored there in Iraq in its reality .	O U-PER O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-GPE O O

There are different groups who have advantage over others in different parts of the country .	O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-ORG|I-LOC|B-GPE L-ORG|L-ORG|L-LOC|L-GPE O
Unfortunately , we do not have a national group that can appeal to Iraqis as Iraqis within a credible voice . This needs to be constructed , maybe through a conference to be held in Baghdad , where representatives from provinces all over Iraq need to participate , as well as political groups .	O O U-GPE O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O

One of the toughest jobs in Iraq right now is that of the military doctor .	O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O
CNN medical correspondent , Dr . Sanjay Gupta , has been traveling with the Devil Docs throughout the war and now they are close to Baghdad .	B-PER|B-PER|U-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-ORG O O O U-GPE O
( BEGIN VIDEOTAPE )	O O O O
Each of these bangs and explosions comes with a story .	O O O O O O O O O O O
Some we ' ll never know .	O U-PER O O O O O
For others , the stories can be seen in their injuries .	O U-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O
Nobody knows these stories better than the Devil Docs , Naval corpsmen who never look the other way , but rather face what needs to be done without flinching .	U-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
They are often the first faces the injured see , be they Iraqi or coalition force members .	U-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER I-ORG|L-PER L-ORG O O U-PER U-GPE O B-PER|B-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O
Even while statutes were coming down and there was dancing in the streets , the consequences of continuing firefights are seen here .	O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC L-FAC O O O O O O O O O O
The work of the Devil Docs is by no means over .	O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O
The Navy has set up a helicopter landing zone just a 100 meters from a mobile operating room , just on the outskirts of Baghdad .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O B-FAC I-FAC|U-VEH I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|L-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-LOC I-FAC|I-LOC I-FAC|I-LOC L-FAC|L-LOC|U-GPE O

He ' s , in my judgment , had a visit that was worth doing , and the president asked him to do it , and it was the right thing to do .	U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O

I think what he wrote me about was the fact that the inter - agency process , where we have all these FBI and Department of Justice and CIA and DIA , and what have you , involved in interrogating these detainees , it takes time to find out what intelligence they have .	U-PER O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O U-PER O B-PER|B-PER|B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER|L-PER|L-PER|U-PER O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
It also takes time to figure out what law enforcement process might be appropriate , and what Colin and I have been concerned about , both of us , is that it ' s taking so long .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O
There are a number of countries , and the Department of State has the responsibility of dealing with those countries , that have foreign nationals in Gitmo , in Guantanamo Bay , Cuba , being detained , and those countries , understandably , would like to know when they could have those people . So the inter - agency process takes a great deal of time .	O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-LOC I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-LOC I-PER|I-LOC I-PER|I-LOC I-PER|L-LOC|U-GPE I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O
Colin and I are trying to speed up that process , and that ' s what that ' s all about .	U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Let me just , a couple of nuggets to sort of wrap up before I let you go .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O
Victory parades for the troops .	O O O B-PER L-PER O

And General Franks and his team have done just a superb job for our country and for the world , and indeed for the Iraqi people , who have been liberated . What ' s the best way to do that ?	O O O O O O O O O O
In the case of 1991 , the task was to go in and get them out of Kuwait , and they did it , and they were properly greeted coming back to the United States .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O U-GPE O O U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O
In this instance , it was a very different task .	O O O O O O O O O O O
It was to remove that regime , and it ' s part of a global war on terrorism that is not over .	O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
We still have to face the problem of a number of global terrorist networks and terrorist states that exist , that work with those global networks . Whether it will be modeled off the 1991 thing , I don ' t know .	O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O

It wouldn ' t surprise me to hear that .	O O O O O U-PER O O O O
But I ' m going to work on the assumption , based on the intelligence that has been gathered , that the weapons of mass destruction existed .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O
What if they don ' t ?	O O U-WEA O O O O
Well , you know , they ' ve used it in the past , and I think the point that Senator Lugar just made - - certainly having the intellectual capacity to do this was proven already by the fact they ' ve used them in the past .	O O U-PER O O U-GPE O O O U-WEA O O O O O U-PER O O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O U-WEA O O O O
So , I wouldn ' t dwell on that point specifically , because Saddam Hussein clearly was a producer and a user of biological and chemical weapons .	O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-WEA I-PER|I-PER|I-WEA I-PER|I-PER|I-WEA L-PER|L-PER|L-WEA O
He clearly was on the track to acquire a nuclear capacity , and the world is a safer place today because he ' s not ruling Iraq .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O O U-PER O O O O U-GPE O

No , we have full credibility in Iraq .	O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O
We ' ve prosecuted with the alliance a successful liberation of the Iraqi people , and we have clearly caused Saddam to destroy weapons of mass destruction , or at least to suppress evidence of them .	U-GPE O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE L-GPE O O U-GPE O O O U-PER O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O U-WEA O
That is a victory of sorts . This is a facet that ' s important .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It ' s important in the war against terrorism that we rout out whatever is there and , likewise , the people involved , because they might help supply al Qaeda or other terrorists along the trail .	O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O B-ORG L-ORG O B-PER L-PER O O O O

O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-ORG|U-PER I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-LOC L-ORG|L-LOC O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O

Death toll in Philippine blast could hit 30 : radio ATTENTION - ADDS fears of toll rising / / /	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
DAVAO , Philippines , March 4 ( AFP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
At least 19 people were killed and 114 people were wounded in Tuesday ' s southern Philippines airport blast , officials said , but reports said the death toll could climb to 30 .	B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O B-FAC|B-LOC I-FAC|L-LOC L-FAC O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Radio station DXDC placed the death toll at 30 , without giving a source for the figure , which officials could not immediately confirm .	B-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
The Davao Medical Center , a regional government hospital , recorded 19 deaths with 50 wounded .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O O
Medical evacuation workers however said the injured list was around 114 , spread out at various hospitals .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC L-FAC O
A powerful bomb tore through a waiting shed at the Davao City international airport at about 5 . 15 pm ( 0915 GMT ) while another explosion hit a bus terminal at the city .	B-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC L-FAC|L-FAC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC|U-VEH I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-GPE L-FAC|L-GPE O
There were no reports of injuries in the second blast .	O O O O O O O O O O O
" It ' s a very powerful bomb .	O U-WEA O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O

Television footage showed medical teams carting away dozens of wounded victims with fully armed troops on guard .	O O O B-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O

Sotheby ' s , Christie ' s pay 40 million dollars over antitrust suits	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
NEW YORK , March 11 ( AFP )	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
The world ' s most powerful fine art auction houses , Sotheby ' s and Christie ' s , have agreed to pay 40 million dollars to settle an international price - fixing scam , Sotheby ' s said .	B-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|L-LOC I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O
The payment , if approved by the courts , would settle a slew of suits by clients over auctions held between 1993 and 2000 outside the United States , it said in a statement .	O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-ORG O O O O O
" Under the terms of the settlement agreement , Sotheby ' s and Christie ' s will each pay 20 million dollars , " said Sotheby ' s , which operates in 34 countries .	O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE L-ORG|L-GPE O
The deal required threatened British and Canadian claims against both auction houses to be dropped .	O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O
Buyers and sellers also would have to agree not to pursue further cases in foreign courts .	U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O
The litigation covers buyers in auctions outside the United States between January 1 , 1993 and February 7 , 2000 , and sellers between September 1 , 1995 and February 7 , 2000 .	O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
Similar claims over US - based auctions were settled in an agreement struck in September 2000 for a total of 512 million dollars .	O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In December 2001 , a Manhattan jury convicted Sotheby ' s main shareholder and former chairman Alfred Taubman of entering into a price - fixing agreement with Christie ' s .	O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O B-PER|B-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
Four months later , the billionaire was sentenced to one year in prison and a 7 . 5 - million - dollar fine over the price - fixing , which prosecutors said had cost clients of both firms 400 million dollars .	O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O U-FAC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O O O
Christie ' s was not prosecuted in the United States after its management agreed to testify against Sotheby ' s and provide documents needed to prove fraudulent intent .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O B-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Together , Sotheby ' s and Christie ' s control more than 90 percent of the fine art and antiques market .	O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Sotheby ' s said it would record the 20 - million - dollar settlement as a special charge for 2002 .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It would be funded in two payments of 10 million dollars each upon preliminary and final court approval .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O
Barry Diller resigns as CEO of Vivendi Universal Entertainment ATTENTION - ADDS details , background / / /	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
NEW YORK , March 19 ( AFP )	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Media tycoon Barry Diller on Wednesday quit as chief of Vivendi Universal Entertainment , the entertainment unit of French giant Vivendi Universal whose future appears up for grabs .	B-PER|B-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|B-ORG|B-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG|L-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG|U-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG|L-ORG O
In a statement , Diller - - who took on the " provisional " role at the top of Vivendi ' s US entertainment operations in December - - said his USA Interactive group will nonetheless remain a shareholder of Vivendi Universal Entertainment .	O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|U-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O B-ORG|U-PER I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O
" My executive role was never intended to be permanent , " said Diller .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O
" Now that Vivendi Universal has begun a formal process in reviewing options for its entertainment assets , it is appropriate to step aside from any direct management responsibility . "	O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
As part of the 11 - billion - dollar sale of USA Interactive ' s film and television operations to the French media company in December 2001 , USA Interactive received 2 . 5 billion dollars in preferred shares in Vivendi Universal Entertainment .	O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG|U-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
Diller , 60 , personally received a 1 . 5 percent stake in the business and had been touted as a likely candidate to run Vivendi Universal ' s entertainment unit in the United States if the troubled French media giant were broken up .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|L-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-GPE I-PER|L-ORG|L-GPE I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|U-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER L-PER O
In Paris , the French media group said parent company chairman Jean - Rene Fourtou will replace Diller as chairman and chief executive of US unit .	O U-GPE O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG|U-ORG L-ORG O B-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG|U-GPE L-PER|L-PER|L-ORG O
Vivendi , in a statement , said that Diller had , " in full agreement with Vivendi Universal , " announced that he was " ending his temporary assignment as CEO of Vivendi Universal Entertainment . "	U-ORG O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O
Vivendi Universal , the world ' s second - largest media group after AOL Time Warner of the United States , has been digging out from under a mountain of debt since the removal of expansionist boss Jean - Marie Messier last July , largely through asset sales .	B-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|L-LOC I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-ORG|I-GPE L-ORG|L-ORG|L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O
Vivendi Universal earlier this month posted a record net loss of 23 . 3 billion euros ( 25 . 6 billion dollars ) for 2002 .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Faced with debt of 35 billion euros ( 37 billion dollars ) in June last year - - including 19 billion from the media and telecoms division alone - - the sprawling conglomerate has set a target of reducing its debt by 16 billion euros by end - 2004 .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
Speculation has been rife that troubled Vivendi has been weighing a spinoff or sale of its US film , television and theme park operations as part of its restructuring .	O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-FAC I-ORG|L-FAC L-ORG O O O U-ORG O O
Press speculation had already suggested that Vivendi might decide to keep its Universal Music division , while either divesting or inviting third parties to take a minority stake in the remaining Entertainment assets .	U-ORG O O O O O U-ORG O O O O B-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O
Earlier this month , sources told Agence France Presse financial news unit AFX that Viacom is studying a bid for Vivendi ' s US entertainment assets placing it as a serious rival squarely in the running against oil billionaire Marvin Davis who has bid 20 billion dollars for the operations . At least 200 , 000 in US , Canadian anti - war demonstrations = ( PICTURES ) = ATTENTION - UPDATES , ADDS details / / /	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
NEW YORK , March 23 ( AFP )	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Some 70 people were arrested Saturday as demonstrators clashed with police at the end of a major peace rally here , as at least 200 , 000 anti - war protesters took to the streets across the United States and Canada .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O U-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-GPE I-FAC|I-GPE I-FAC|L-GPE I-FAC L-FAC|U-GPE O
For the most part the marches went off peacefully , but in New York a small group of protesters were arrested after they refused to go home at the end of their rally , police sources said . Several police officers were treated for the effects of gas after the ensuing clashes - - a result , police said , of the demonstrators using self - defence devices .	B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O
Organisers claimed that some 250 , 000 people attended the rally , creating a human column some three kilometres ( 1 . 8 miles ) long .	U-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
Police put the attandance at around 125 , 000 .	U-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O
The city assigned 2 , 000 police officers to the rally , including undercover officers who carried beeper - sized radiation detectors and other counter - terrorism equipment . Among the sea of banners making its way up Broadway were many signs poking fun at President George W . Bush .	O O O O O O O O O U-FAC O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O

Indonesia delays execution of convicts including Indian on death row	O O O O O O O O O O
JAKARTA , March 27 ( AFP )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Indonesia will delay the execution of six convicts including an Indian on death row after five of them appealed to the Supreme Court for a second review , prosecutors said Thursday .	U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER|U-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O O O
" If we execute them now we can ' t bring them to life again should their appeals for a review be granted , " said Antasari Azhar , spokesman for the attorney general ' s office .	O O U-GPE O U-PER O U-GPE O O O O U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|B-PER I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER I-PER|I-ORG|L-PER I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O
The Supreme Court rejected earlier appeals for a case review from five of the convicts .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER L-PER|L-PER O
The sixth offender has only made one appeal for a review .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O
President Megawati Sukarnoputri has refused clemency for the six and asked for a speedy execution .	B-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O
Five of them are Indonesians convicted of murders while the other is an Indian drug offender , Ayodhya Prasad Chaubey .	B-PER I-PER L-PER|U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER O
" We are talking about someone ' s life or death so we have to be very careful , " Azhar said .	O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O
A convict can file a case review or appeal for presidential clemency only after the Supreme Court upholds a sentence imposed by a lower court .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
Apart from those convicted of murder , 16 people are on death row for drug trafficking - - 11 foreigners , four Indonesians and a Dutch citizen of Chinese - Indonesian origin .	O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
Indonesian courts have increasingly handed out severe sentences , including death , for drug smugglers .	B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O
Narcotics abuse is an increasingly serious problem in the country .	O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
Amnesty International has appealed to Indonesia to spare the lives of convicted drug offenders and others , saying there was no proof the death penalty deters would - be traffickers more effectively than other punishments .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O
Amnesty opposes the death penalty for any crime .	U-ORG O O O O O O O O
Use of the death penalty is rare in Indonesia , where the last execution was carried out in May 2001 of two men convicted of a murder in 1989 .	O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER L-GPE|L-PER O
It was the first execution for five years .	O O O O O O O O O
A police firing squad enforces the penalty .	B-PER I-PER|U-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O O
2 , 500 Japanese students in Osaka protest against Iraq war	O O O O O O O O O O O
TOKYO , March 30 ( AFP )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Some 2 , 500 mainly university students formed a human chain in Japanese characters spelling out " No War " in Osaka on Sunday to protest against the ongoing US - led military campaign in Iraq .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O U-PER O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O U-GPE O O U-ORG O O U-GPE O

Protesters , who exceeded the 2 , 000 expected to show up at the park at Osaka Castle in the city ' s downtown neighbourhood , carried placards that read " Stop war " and " Love and Peace " while forming the human chain after 3 : 00 pm ( 0600 GMT ) , Jiji said . The protest follows a string of others involving tens of thousands of peace activists across Japan since January .	O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O O O
According to a poll by Kyodo news agency released Saturday , 78 of 100 people surveyed opposed the military action in Iraq .	O O O O O B-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O U-ORG O O U-GPE O

Russia hints " peace camp " alliance with Germany and France is dying by Dmitry Zaks	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
MOSCOW , April 13 ( AFP )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Russian President Vladimir Putin ' s summit with the leaders of Germany and France may have been a failure that proves there can be no long - term " peace camp " alliance following the end of war in Iraq , government sources were quoted as saying at the weekend .	B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O
" Senior government officials , speaking in the corridors of power in Moscow , have no illusions about any long - term perspectives for the ( Russian - German - French ) axis , " the respected Izvestia daily reported .	O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC|U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O
" Sooner or later Iraq will fall and Russia and the United Sates will resume normal relations , " the senior Moscow official , who was reported to be close to Putin , told the paper .	O O O O U-GPE O O O U-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O B-ORG L-ORG O
" The situation in Iraq does not mean that we intend to get into an argument with the United States . "	O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O
The comments indicate that Russia ' s nuanced position over the war in Iraq was becoming ever more scrambled , with Putin pushing to protect his budding friendship with US President George W . Bush in the face of strident opposition from the Russian media and other top Kremlin officials .	O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
Analysts have long argued that Putin is far keener to preserve friendly relations with the United States than the pro - European , anti - war camps embedded in much of the Russian media and the foreign and defense ministries . GUWAHATI , India , April 17 ( AFP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
At least three members of a family in Indias northeastern state of Tripura were hacked to death by a tribal mob for allegedly practicing witchcraft , police said Thursday . The admission , according to US sources , came during three - day talks in Beijing which concluded Friday , the first meeting between US and North Korean officials since the nuclear crisis erupted six months ago . China expressed hopes that both sides would keep the dialogue alive while officials in Moscow and London called for patience in resolving the complex impasse .	U-GPE O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O O O O O O O O O
South Korea and Japan were cautious , with Seoul Foreign Minister Yoon Young - Kwan saying if the North Koreans were telling the truth , it would represent a " major " threat to peace in Northeast Asia .	B-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O
US sources with authoritative knowledge of the Beijing meetings said the head of the North Korean delegation Li Gun had confirmed to US envoy James Kelly that the Stalinist state had developed nuclear weapons and hinted it may sell or use them , depending on US actions .	B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|L-GPE L-PER|L-ORG B-PER L-PER O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O B-WEA|U-WEA L-WEA O O U-GPE O O O O U-WEA O O O U-GPE O O
" They said what we always knew , that they do have weapons , " one US source said .	O U-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O U-WEA O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O
" That doesn ' t shock us , we have been saying it .	O O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O
Now they have said it . "	O U-GPE O O O O O
Li also told Kelly that North Korea had gone ahead with reprocessing 8 , 000 spent fuel rods at its Yongbyon plant , which could produce enough weapons grade plutonium for several more nuclear bombs , said the sources who requested anonymity .	U-PER O O U-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC|U-GPE I-FAC|U-GPE L-FAC O U-FAC O O O U-WEA O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|U-WEA L-WEA O O B-PER L-PER U-PER O O O
An angry US President George W . Bush accused Pyongyang of reverting to blackmail following the nuclear admission and North Korea fired back with a charge that Washington had rejected a " bold " plan to resolve the six - month - old impasse . The outcome of the talks plunged financial markets into freefall in Seoul with analysts saying they saw no sign of a recovery any time soon .	O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O
Despite the leaked details about the meetings , US officials publicly declined to confirm any of North Korea ' s announcements , with US State Department spokesman Richard Boucher saying comments made by North Koreans " require careful analysis . A Pakistani court in central Punjab province has sentenced a Christian man to life imprisonment for a blasphemy conviction , police said Sunday .	B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC L-ORG|L-LOC O O B-PER I-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O

Ranjha was accused of tearing down a billboard carrying verses from the Koran in Faisalabad during a Christian demonstration after the city ' s bishop committed suicide over the 1985 blasphemy law . Chief executive Jean - Rene Fourtou told shareholders at the group ' s annual general meeting Tuesday that the sale of Vivendi Universal Entertainment was a major goal for 2003 , and that negotiations were already under way . However , Fourtou said he had not yet received any firm offer for its giant US music business , Universal Music Group , and had taken no final decision over its future .	O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O

MCI to pay huge fine to SEC for accounting fraud : report	O O O O O O O O O O O O
WASHINGTON , May 19 ( AFP )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
MCI , formerly WorldCom , and the Securities and Exchange Commission have reached a final agreement in the telecom giant ' s 11 - billion - dollar ( 9 . 4 - billion - euro ) fraud case , The Wall Street Journal reported Monday .	U-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O
Under terms of the agreement , to be submitted as early as Monday to a judge presiding over the case , MCI would agree to pay the largest fine imposed so far by the SEC on a company that is not a broker - dealer , the Journal said , citing sources close to the matter .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
The report did not give the amount of the fine , but said it would be " exponentially larger " than the historic 10 million dollars Xerox paid the SEC last year .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O O
Last month , the SEC slapped fines totaling 1 . 4 billion dollars on 10 Wall Street brokerages to settle charges of conflicts of interest between analysts and investors .	O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|L-LOC L-ORG O O O O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O
MCI and the SEC negotiated the agreement for months after a partial settlement in November under which MCI , formerly known as WorldCom , agreed not to mislead investors about its finances , and to improve internal controls , the Journal said .	U-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O U-ORG O O O O O U-PER O U-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O
The estimated value of the fraud has reached historic proportions , swelling from the initially announced 3 . 5 million dollars to 11 million dollars as revelations of misconduct piled on , the report said .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Separately , former WorldCom CEO Bernard Ebbers failed on April 29 to make a first repayment of 25 million dollars , plus interest , on a 400 - million - dollar loan from MCI , the Journal said , citing SEC documents .	O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-ORG O O
Because he is now in default MCI must now seize additional assets owned by Ebbers , to secure the loan .	O U-PER O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O
The company has already sold his Georgia - based yacht building business for 15 million dollars , and is close to selling his ranch in British Colombia , which is expected to bring 60 to 70 million dollars , the Journal said . Despite a security crackdown over the weekend in Baghdad and an announcement that some 7 , 000 policemen had returned to their jobs since the end of the war , ordinary Iraqis still felt unsafe on the street with gunfire rife and police a near invisible presence . SINGAPORE , May 30 ( AFP )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Singapore doctors will proceed with an unpredecented and risky operation to separate a pair of adult Iranian twins joined at the head , a hospital official said Friday .	B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O

Reports to the Security Council on Friday by Blix and chief nuclear inspector Mohammed ElBaradei praised Iraq ' s recent compliance .	O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-PER O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O U-GPE O O O O O

U . S . President George W . Bush said the reports indicated that only a war will make Iraq disarm .	B-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O
` ` Unfortunately , it is clear that Saddam Hussein is still violating the demands of the United Nations by refusing to disarm , ' ' he told Americans in a radio address Saturday .	O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O U-PER O U-GPE O O O O O O
Iraq , however , took the report as an endorsement of its work and argued not only that war plans should be canceled , but that sanctions imposed on it by the Security Council for its 1990 invasion of Kuwait should be removed .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O O
` ` We demand that the Security Council and the world decide on . . . the lifting of sanctions on Iraq in a comprehensive and complete way , ' ' said a spokesman for a meeting Saturday of Saddam and top - level officials , quoted by official Iraqi news media .	O O U-GPE O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-LOC L-LOC O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O
The unidentified spokesman claimed the weapons inspectors had verified Iraq has rid itself of weapons of mass destruction _ something the inspectors said would take months to do _ and appealed for a ban on such weapons to be extended beyond Iraq : to Israel , and eventually to the United States .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-WEA L-PER O O U-GPE O O U-GPE O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O U-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O
The spokesman , reporting on the meeting , said Iraq called on the Security Council ` ` to rid the Middle East of weapons of mass destruction since Iraq has become free of them . ' '	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-GPE O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O U-GPE O O O O U-WEA O O O
` ` At the front of those that must be rid of these weapons is the Zionist entity , ' ' he said in a reference to Israel , adding that the order should ` ` move on after this region to America . ' '	O O O O O O U-GPE U-GPE O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O U-PER O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O
The newspaper Babil , a popular daily owned by Saddam ' s son Odai , also said Saturday that the reports of Blix and ElBaradei were enough to suspend the sanctions , which are to be removed when the United Nations verifies that Iraq has no weapons of mass destruction or the means to make them .	B-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER|U-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|L-PER L-ORG|U-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O U-GPE O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O O U-WEA O
In a front - page editorial , Babil said the reports should push Security Council members ` ` to think seriously about issuing a resolution lifting the sanctions imposed on Iraq , since it was proven that we don ' t possess weapons of mass destruction . ' '	O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O
Saddam has long claimed Iraq destroyed all its weapons of mass destruction .	U-PER O O O U-GPE O B-WEA I-WEA|U-GPE I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O
The United States and Britain claim he ' s lying , and have assembled a quarter - million troops around Iraq for a possible invasion .	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-GPE O O O O O
Despite Iraq ' s demands of the Security Council , diplomats were working hard on very different proposals : a U . S . - led plan for disarmament or war by March 17 , and a rival French plan for an emergency summit of Security Council members to come up with a compromise .	O U-GPE O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-PER O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O
Bush and top advisers planned to lobby allies by telephone through the weekend and up until next week ' s planned vote on the ultimatum .	U-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
French President Jacques Chirac talked to heads of state in an effort to drum up support for his plan , his office said .	B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-PER O O B-ORG|U-PER L-ORG O O
Inspectors ' spokesman Hiro Ueki said Iraqi workers crushed six Al Samoud 2 missiles Saturday at the al - Taji military complex north of Baghdad , under the supervision of weapons inspectors .	B-PER|B-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O B-WEA I-WEA|B-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|L-WEA L-WEA O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|U-ORG I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC|U-GPE O O O O O B-PER|U-WEA L-PER O
Three of the missiles had warheads and three didn ' t , apparently because they hadn ' t been deployed .	B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|B-WEA L-WEA|L-WEA O O O U-WEA O O O O O O U-WEA O O O O O O
Inspectors also supervised the destruction of tools and ` ` special equipment used to produce the Al Samoud 2 engine ' ' at the Al Samoud factory , he said , and another group of inspectors verified the emptying of Al Samoud 2 warheads at the Qa Qa complex just south of Baghdad . Odai al - Taie , a senior Information Ministry official , said the workers crushing the missiles took Friday off because they had worked on Tuesday , the Muslim new year . Ueki described Friday as a ` ` planning day ' ' for teams working on missile destruction .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-WEA L-PER O

Report : Hong Kong Jockey Club in talks to acquire its Macau rival	O O O O O O O O O O O O O
HONG KONG ( AP )	B-GPE L-GPE O U-ORG O
The Hong Kong Jockey Club is in talks about buying out the horse racing club in neighboring Macau , a newspaper reported Tuesday .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE L-ORG|L-GPE O B-ORG L-ORG O O O
The South China Morning Post quoted Hong Kong Jockey Club Chief Executive Lawrence Wong as saying the discussions were underway , but no price was reported .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Hong Kong club is a charitable entity , while the Macau Jockey Club is a for - profit concern controlled by gambling tycoon Stanley Ho .	B-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER|B-PER I-ORG|I-PER|L-PER I-ORG|I-PER L-ORG|L-PER O
Hong Kong angered Macau ' s gaming industry last year when it banned gamblers in Hong Kong from placing horse bets with anyone but the Hong Kong Jockey Club .	B-GPE L-GPE O B-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O
Macau had been taking off - track bets from people in Hong Kong , but the offices handling those wagers were closed .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O
The Macau club later threatened to start taking wagers on Hong Kong races in Macau , at a better price for gamblers because less tax would be levied , but the plan never materialized .	B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Neither club immediately returned phone calls from The Associated Press to inquire about the buyout talks .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O
Macau is a gambling enclave 60 kilometers ( 40 miles ) west of Hong Kong that was governed by the Portuguese for more than four centuries before it returned to Chinese sovereignty in 1999 . Turkish party leader Recep Tayyip Erdogan named prime minister , may push to allow in U . S . troops	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
ANKARA , Turkey ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
The charismatic leader of Turkey ' s governing party was named prime minister Tuesday , a step that probably boosts chances that the United States will get permission to deploy troops in the country along Iraq ' s northern border .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O B-LOC|U-GPE I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O
Recep Tayyip Erdogan , who favors the deployment , hinted that he will reshuffle the Cabinet , but gave no indication if he would purge officials who opposed letting in the troops as analysts have suggested he might do . U-PER O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG|U-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER|L-PER O
Turks overwhelmingly oppose a war _ by 94 percent , according to some polls .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Earlier this month , the Turkish parliament shocked the United States by rejecting the deployment by just four votes .	O O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O
Erdogan has hinted that he will resubmit the resolution for approval , which could take another week .	U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Also in Washington , Turkish Ambassador Farouk Logoglu told The Associated Press that the U . S . and Turkish militaries were holding informal discussions on the use of Turkish airspace .	O O U-GPE O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O O B-LOC|U-GPE L-LOC O
The troop - basing resolution would allow the United States to use Turkish airspace .	O U-PER O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O B-LOC|U-GPE L-LOC O
If the resolution is not passed , Washington would likely want to use the airspace for strikes against Iraq and for airlifting troops to northern Iraq .	O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O O O U-GPE O O O U-PER O B-LOC L-LOC O
Refusing access to the troop deployment would mean Turkey would lose a US $ 15 billion U . S . aid package that Washington has offered to help cushion the country ' s economy if there is war . Turkey , which fears northern Iraqi Kurds may declare independence in the aftermath of a war , has been pressing for a say if Saddam Hussein is ousted . BRUSSELS , Belgium ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
Europe ' s divide over Iraq loomed ever larger Tuesday with France and Germany denouncing the U . S . move toward war while British Prime Minister Tony Blair said ousting Saddam Hussein now was key to solving similar crises in the future .	U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
As European Union leaders restated their opposing views on Iraq , their foreign ministers debated the impending U . S . - led war against Iraq with EU president Greece keeping up appearances with a pledge to pursue a last ditch effort to avoid war . Joschka Fischer and Dominique de Villepin , the German and French foreign ministers , were to attend a special United Nations Security Council meeting in New York Wednesday , called to issue a last - minute appeal for a peaceful solution to the Iraq crisis . Britain , Spain , Denmark , Italy , the Netherlands and Portugal back the United States while France and Germany lead a group of nations opposing military action . U . S . and British troops move on Basra following assault on Baghdad	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
SOUTHERN IRAQ ( AP )	B-LOC L-LOC O U-ORG O
U . S . and British troops were moving on the strategic southern port city of Basra Saturday after a massive aerial assault pounded Baghdad at dawn .	B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O
Thousands of beleaguered Iraqi soldiers in the south surrendered in the face of the major push .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-LOC L-PER|L-LOC O O O O O O O O O
The battle for Basra , an oil hub of some 1 . 3 million people , was underway by midday , with coalition troops trying to surround Iraqi positions and force a surrender .	O O O U-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER L-GPE|L-PER O O O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-LOC|U-GPE L-LOC O O O O O
U . S . aircraft bombed Iraqi tanks holding bridges close to the city .	B-VEH|B-GPE I-VEH|I-GPE I-VEH|L-GPE I-VEH L-VEH O B-VEH|U-GPE L-VEH O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-GPE L-FAC|L-GPE O
Iraqi forces responded with artillery fire .	B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O B-WEA|U-WEA L-WEA O
Earlier Saturday , Baghdad was again targeted , one day after a massive U . S . aerial bombardment in which more than 300 Tomahawk cruise missiles rained down on the capital .	O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|U-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
The nine - story Security Headquarters in the Iraqi capital took a direct hit , strewing bricks , masonry and glass across the street in the al - Salhiya neighborhood of central Baghdad . As coalition troops advanced , an entire Iraqi army division gave itself up , U . S . military officials said .	O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG O O B-PER|B-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|L-GPE I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O
The division _ the 51st Infantry Division , with 8 , 000 men and as many as 200 tanks , a key unit in the defense of Basra _ was the largest defection in a day when Iraqi leader Saddam Hussein ' s forces showed signs of crumbling . Saturday morning , American Marines and British troops rumbled along the main road from the Kuwaiti border to Basra , Highway 80 , nicknamed the ` ` Highway of Death ' ' during the 1991 Gulf War , when U . S . airstrikes wiped out an Iraqi military convoy along it . LAHAINA , Hawaii ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O

Gordon Campbell was ordered to pay fines and fees totaling $ 913 , complete a 14 - hour alcohol assessment program and have a substance abuse assessment .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Campbell was not in court .	U-PER O O O O O

He also brought a check from Campbell to pay the fines and fees .	U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O

Russia has accepted a US $ 150 million World Bank loan to combat the spread of AIDS and tuberculosis , ending a negotiating process that lasted four years , World Bank officials said Friday .	U-GPE O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O

` ` Russia has one of the fastest growing AIDS epidemics in the world ' ' and has a ` ` fearsome ' ' problem with tuberculosis , particularly drug - resistant strains , said Olesoji Adeyi , a World Bank health specialist . Eliminating such weapons was a chief reason President George W . Bush gave for the U . S . - led invasion of Iraq that began March 20 .	O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O
Gen . Vincent Brooks announced the capture of Barzan Ibrahim Hasan al - Tikriti , telling reporters he was an adviser to Saddam ` ` with extensive knowledge of the regime ' s inner workings . ' '	O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-PER U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O
A U . S . intelligence official , speaking on condition of anonymity , said Barzan Ibrahim had been a presidential adviser to Saddam ' s regime since 1998 , but had a shaky relationship with his half brother and was not part of the regime ' s inner circle .	B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|U-PER I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O
He was a representative to the United Nations in Geneva from 1989 to 1998 .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
Earlier , from 1979 to 1983 , he headed Iraq ' s Mukhabarat , or intelligence service , a period when the organization arranged executions of regime opponents in Iraq and overseas , the official said .	O O O O O O O U-PER O B-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER|U-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O
Brooks provided scant details of the operation that netted Barzan Ibrahim , saying he was taken inside Baghdad and that U . S . special forces were aided by Marines .	U-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O U-GPE O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O U-PER O
He said there were no casualties .	U-PER O O O O O O
Another of Saddam ' s three half brothers , Watban Ibrahim Hasan al - Tikriti , was captured earlier by U . S . forces .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O
The third has not been found .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O
American forces have been criticized for failing to stop looting in several Baghdad cities , and there have been complaints , as well , that humanitarian relief has been slow in arriving .	B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But Marines foiled a brazen act of lawlessness during the day when they interrupted a robbery - in - progress at a branch of the al - Rashid Bank and took away US $ 4 million for safekeeping .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-ORG I-FAC|I-ORG I-FAC|I-ORG I-FAC|I-ORG L-FAC|L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
Thieves had blown a hole in the vault and dropped children in to bring out fistfuls of cash .	U-PER O O O O O B-FAC L-FAC O O U-PER O O O O O O O O
As word spread that the robbery was under way , Iraqis gathered , saying they had accounts at the branch , and a riot broke out .	O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O B-FAC L-FAC O O O O O O O
Marines broke it up _ over the protests of Iraqis not involved in the robbery _ and the thieves were arrested .	U-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-PER L-PER O O O

There was evidence of slow progress .	O O O O O O O

The fighting broke out between club - wielding members of the former ruler ' s clan and a rival group , he said .	O O O O O B-PER|U-WEA I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O O

France proposes suspending U . N . sanctions against Iraq , a step toward U . S . goal	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
UNITED NATIONS ( AP )	B-FAC|B-FAC L-FAC|L-FAC O U-ORG O
France on Tuesday proposed immediately suspending U . N . sanctions targeting Iraq civilians , an important step toward the U . S . goal of ending trade embargoes that have crippled the country ' s economy .	U-GPE O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O
The surprise move by France , which led opposition to the U . S . war against Iraq , followed last week ' s call by U . S . President George W . Bush for sanctions to be lifted quickly , so Iraq can trade freely and its oil revenue can be used to finance reconstruction .	O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O
France ' s U . N . ambassador , Jean - Marc de La Sabliere , made the proposal at a Security Council meeting where members heard a briefing by chief U . N . weapons inspector Hans Blix and for the first time exchanged views on potentially divisive postwar issues .	B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O U-PER O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-WEA I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The proposal would end the U . N . ban on trade and investment in Iraq while leaving a 12 - year - old arms embargo in place .	O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-WEA O O O O
The Security Council imposed sanctions after Iraq ' s 1990 invasion of Kuwait .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O
Under council resolutions , sanctions cannot be lifted until U . N . inspectors certify that Iraq ' s nuclear , chemical and biological weapons have been destroyed along with the long - range missiles to deliver them .	O U-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O B-WEA|B-WEA|B-WEA|B-WEA|U-GPE I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA L-WEA|L-WEA|L-WEA|L-WEA O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA|U-WEA O
Along with France , Russia , Germany and China also strongly opposed the war .	O O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O
But de La Sabliere said before the meeting that Security Council ` ` must take into account the new realities on the ground . ' '	O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Russian Ambassador Sergey Lavrov had said his country is ` ` not at all opposed to the lifting of sanctions . ' '	B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-GPE|U-PER L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But he said Russia wants U . N . inspectors to certify that Iraq has been disarmed of all weapons of mass destruction , as required under U . N . resolutions .	O U-PER O U-GPE O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O U-GPE O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O
Asked about the French proposal , he said : ` ` We are ready to discuss it . ' '	O O O U-GPE O O U-PER O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O
At another closed - door council meeting later Tuesday , the council was to hear from Benon Sevan , head of the U . N . oil - for - food program , which had been providing food for 60 percent of Iraq ' s 24 million people .	O O O O O U-ORG O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O
France ' s de La Sabliere said he also proposed that the council phase out the oil - for - food program , which allowed Iraq to sell unlimited quantities of oil provided the money went for humanitarian goods and compensation to victims of the first Gulf War .	B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-LOC L-PER O
` ` There should be some adjustment with a view of a phasing out of this program , ' ' de La Sabliere said .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O
This is one of the difficult decisions the council will face in the weeks ahead on divisive issues stemming from the war against Iraq .	O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O
These include not only Iraq ' s disarmament and the future of sanctions but the U . N . role in Iraq now that the fighting is over , control of Iraq ' s oil revenue , and lucrative reconstruction contracts .	O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O
Blix stressed that council resolutions call for U . N . inspectors to have access to all sites and people in Iraq .	U-PER O O U-ORG O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O O B-FAC|B-PER I-FAC|I-PER I-FAC|I-PER I-FAC|I-PER I-FAC|I-PER L-FAC|L-PER|U-GPE O
He said he told the council that he believes the world would like Iraq ' s disarmament confirmed by an international body that has been involved in the country for over 10 years .	U-PER O U-PER O B-ORG L-ORG O U-PER O B-LOC L-LOC O O U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER U-PER O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O
The Bush administration , which accused Blix of hindering its drive for international support for the war , has already sent its own teams to Iraq to search for illegal weapons . ` ` At the moment , the coalition has assumed the responsibilities for disarming Iraq , ' ' U . S .	O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O U-GPE O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O

He said important scientists had turned themselves in , and the atmosphere had changed which should enable any Iraqi ` ` to speak more freely and speak without fear of retribution to those who are asking them the questions . ' '	U-PER O B-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER U-PER O O U-PER O O O O O

' '	B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O

He also envisioned U . S . and U . N . inspectors working together .	U-PER O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O

In an interview with BBC radio aired Tuesday , Blix said that before the war , the U . S . and Britain appeared to have used ` ` shaky ' ' intelligence , including forged documents , in an effort to prove Iraq had banned weapons .	O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O B-WEA L-WEA O

U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE|B-LOC I-GPE|L-LOC I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O

S . government won ' t be involved in choosing subcontractors for American companies named to help rebuild Iraq . Those companies can subcontract to any company they want , ' ' Elizabeth Jones said .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER L-PER O O
She made the statements after a meeting with the speaker of the Portuguese parliament , Joao Mota Amaral .	U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|U-GPE L-PER|L-ORG O B-PER I-PER L-PER O
` ` The U . S . government has done what it is going to do : it has opened up the process to international companies .	O O B-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|L-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O
We can ' t direct commerce , ' ' Jones said .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
` ` Once it ' s a commercial proposition , then international bidding processes come into effect . ' '	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Jones met with Defense Minister Paulo Portas on Tuesday and will meet Foreign Minister Antonio Martins da Cruz before leaving Portugal Wednesday .	U-PER O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-GPE O O
About 50 Portuguese companies - mostly in the construction sector _ are applying for subcontracts to help rebuild Iraq , Portuguese media reported .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O U-GPE O B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O
Many are hoping to reap benefits from Portuguese government support of the U . S . - led war to oust Saddam Hussein .	U-ORG O O O O O O B-GPE|U-GPE L-GPE O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O
Also , Portugal hosted a last ditch pre - war summit in the Azores islands for leaders of the United States , Britain and Spain .	O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O
Singapore extends use of SARS thermal scanners to include checkpoints with Malaysia	O O O O O O O O O O O O
SINGAPORE ( AP )	U-GPE O U-ORG O
Singapore authorities extended the use of its state - of - the - art thermal imaging scanner to fight the deadly SARS virus by placing units at its border with Malaysia .	B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC|U-GPE I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC|U-GPE O
The Immigration and Checkpoints Authority said it began a trial of the scanners Wednesday at its Woodlands and Tuas checkpoints to screen for people suffering from severe acute respiratory syndrome .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG O O O O O O O O B-FAC|U-ORG I-FAC|U-LOC I-FAC I-FAC|U-LOC L-FAC O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
Nine scanners , developed locally for military purposes , were placed at Singapore ' s Changi Airport last week to check people arriving from SARS - affected countries .	O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O B-FAC|U-GPE I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O
Those who show up on the camera screen as ` ` hot bodies , ' ' or with a temperature greater than 37 . 5 degrees Celsius ( 99 . 5 degrees Fahrenheit ) , will be pulled aside .	U-PER U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Each day about 90 , 000 people cross the border between Malaysia and Singapore .	O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|U-GPE I-LOC L-LOC|U-GPE O
Any person found to be entering Singapore with a high temperature would be directed to a nearby nurse station for further checks .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|U-PER L-FAC O O O O
Singapore has reported 16 deaths , the world ' s third - highest toll , out of 186 infected from the flu - like illness .	U-GPE O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
Globally , at least 236 people have died and more than 4 , 000 have become sickened with the illness .	O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O
Immigration and Checkpoints Authority spokeswoman Ngoon Pei Ling said during the trial period the scanners would be placed at bus checkpoints , where passengers are already required to disembark for immigration purposes . NEW YORK ( AP )	B-GPE L-GPE O U-ORG O
Rudolph Giuliani will wed his companion , Judith Nathan , on May 24 in the ex - mayor ' s old home , Gracie Mansion .	B-PER L-PER O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O B-FAC|B-PER I-FAC|I-PER I-FAC|I-PER I-FAC|L-PER I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O B-FAC L-FAC O

His successor , Mayor Michael Bloomberg , will perform the ceremony .	B-PER|U-PER L-PER O B-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O
Giuliani , 58 , proposed to Nathan , a former nurse , during a November business trip to Paris _ five months after he finalized his divorce from Donna Hanover after 20 years of marriage .	U-PER O O O O O U-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O
In interviews last year , Giuliani said Nathan gave him ` ` tremendous emotional support ' ' through his treatment for prostate cancer and as he led the city during the aftermath of the Sept . 11 terrorist attack on the World Trade Center .	O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O U-PER O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O
` ` We were close already , ' ' Giuliani said .	O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O
` ` And then we went through hell together . ' '	O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O
Giuliani and Nathan began appearing in public together in May 2000 .	U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O
Soon after , he announced that he and Hanover were moving toward legal separation .	O O O U-PER O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O
During the legal proceedings leading up to the divorce , a judge ruled that Nathan could not visit Gracie Mansion , the official mayoral residence , as long as Giuliani ' s children lived there .	O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O B-FAC L-FAC O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-FAC O
Giuliani and Hanover have two teenage children , Andrew and Caroline .	U-PER O U-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O U-PER O
The divorce settlement called for Giuliani to pay Hanover more than $ 6 . 8 million .	O O O O O U-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O O
Hanover , 53 , is host of a syndicated television show , ` ` Famous Homes and Hideaways . ' '	U-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O
Last month , she and her fiance _ an old high school sweetheart _ invited the press along as they went shopping for wedding bands , saying they are planning a wedding in the New York City area this summer .	O O O U-PER O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC|B-GPE I-LOC|I-GPE I-LOC|L-GPE L-LOC O O O
Giuliani ' s first marriage to his second cousin , Regina Peruggi , lasted about 14 years .	U-PER O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O
It was annulled by the Catholic Church because the couple had not obtained a church dispensation required when second cousins marry .	O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-PER L-PER O O O O U-ORG O O O B-PER L-PER O O

They have a teenage daughter .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER L-PER O
