U . S . , Britain drafting resolution limiting U . N . role in Iraq to humanitarian relief	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
LONDON ( AP )	U-GPE O U-ORG O
The United States and Britain are preparing a resolution that would give the United Nations a role in humanitarian relief but not peacekeeping in Iraq , a senior official in U . S . President George W . Bush ' s administration said Friday .	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|B-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER I-PER|I-ORG|I-PER I-PER|I-ORG|L-PER I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O O
Separately , the United States has decided to divide the military and humanitarian relief mission in Iraq into three parts under American , British and Polish command , the official said , speaking on condition of anonymity .	O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O
Six European countries have agreed to contribute troops to the British and Polish sectors to create an international stability force , the official said .	B-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-PER O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-PER L-PER O O
The draft resolution would limit the U . N . role to helping with refugees and displaced people , reconstruction and humanitarian assistance , the official said .	O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O
The United States and Britain agree on all but a few of the fine details of the resolution , the official said , though there is no timetable on when it would be introduced .	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
U . N . officials are already in Iraq providing humanitarian relief .	B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER L-PER O O O U-GPE O O O O
U . N . Secretary General Kofi Annan said this week that the body has no interest in policing a postwar Iraq , although it could contribute to the political resuscitation of the country .	B-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O U-ORG O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
` ` Take the question of security .	O O O O O O O O
I don ' t think the U . N . would want to take on that , ' ' Annan said .	U-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
` ` There has been a suggestion that the U . N . wanted to take over the whole Iraq and run it , which was also not the case . ' '	O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O
What the United Nations could contribute beyond humanitarian assistance was ` ` political facilitation , ' ' Annan said .	O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
The proposed draft resolution would probably face resistance from other U . N . Security Council members who have favored a U . N . - convened conference of the kind that helped establish Afghanistan ' s post - Taliban government .	O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|B-ORG|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|L-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE|U-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE|U-ORG L-PER|L-GPE O
U . S . Defense Secretary Donald H . Rumsfeld discussed the resolution with Prime Minister Tony Blair and Defense Secretary Geoff Hoon on Friday as Rumsfeld returned from a tour of Iraq , Afghanistan and the Persian Gulf region .	B-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O B-LOC I-LOC|B-LOC I-LOC|L-LOC L-LOC O
Rumsfeld said afterward he hoped the U . N . would play a role but did not publicly discuss the draft resolution outlining that role .	U-PER O O U-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Hoon , who joined Rumsfeld in a news conference at Heathrow airport , also did not mention the draft resolution .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-FAC L-PER|L-FAC O O O O O O O O O
` ` We are right to be optimistic about the way forward ' ' in Iraq , Hoon said .	O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O U-PER O O
International stability forces will be sent to Iraq as soon as possible , the U . S . official said , though it was unclear when that would be .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
Those troops will work to restore and maintain order and supervise humanitarian projects such as the restoration of water and electricity and delivery of food and medical aid .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The six nations contributing troops are Italy , Spain , Ukraine , Denmark , the Netherlands and Bulgaria , the official said .	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-PER O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O B-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O B-PER L-PER O O
Representatives of those countries will meet with British officials May 7 and Polish officials May 22 to determine what forces each country will contribute and whether they will be put under British or Polish command .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O U-ORG B-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-ORG O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O
The U . S . part of the stability force will be comprised of American troops .	B-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
While that portion is likely to consist of a military division _ about 20 , 000 _ the troop strength of the other two sectors has yet to be determined , the official said .	O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O
The international stabilization force would be under the U . S . war commander , Gen . Tommy Franks .	B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
At least initially , the coalition stability forces will augment rather than replace the 135 , 000 American troops inside Iraq , the official said .	O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O B-PER L-PER O O
The stability forces will focus on providing security and humanitarian relief while other U . S . troops focus on rooting out leftover members of Saddam Hussein ' s government and other armed elements in Iraq .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG|B-PER I-PER|I-ORG|L-PER I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O
Rumsfeld said , however , that the more troops other countries contribute to the stability effort , the fewer U . S . troops will be needed inside Iraq .	U-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O
Planning for both the U . N . resolution and the international security force left out France , Germany and Russia , three U . S . allies that vehemently opposed the war in Iraq .	O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O U-GPE O U-GPE O U-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|L-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O
Some of the NATO members who agreed to send troops may want NATO authorization for that action , the official said .	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE|U-ORG I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE L-GPE|L-GPE|U-PER O O U-ORG O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O
Requests for such authorization will be routed through the alliance ' s defense planning committee , which does not include France , the official said .	O O O O O O O O B-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-GPE O B-PER L-PER O O
The outlines for the international stability force were decided at a conference Hoon hosted Wednesday with representatives from 16 countries , mostly NATO members .	O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE|U-ORG L-PER|L-GPE O
Other countries including the Philippines , South Korea , Qatar and Australia agreed to send other help such as field hospitals , engineers , explosive ordnance disposal teams or nuclear , biological and chemical weapons experts .	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|L-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|L-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O O O O B-FAC L-FAC O U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-WEA I-PER|I-WEA I-PER|I-WEA I-PER|I-WEA I-PER|I-WEA I-PER|L-WEA L-PER O
The U . S . , British and Polish sectors will be drawn to take into account ethnic , religious , tribal and political factions within Iraq , the official said .	B-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O B-PER L-PER O O
For example , although ethnic Kurds are the majority in large parts of northern Iraq , there are also large numbers of Kurds within Baghdad .	O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-LOC I-PER|I-LOC I-PER|I-LOC I-PER|I-LOC|B-LOC L-PER|L-LOC|L-LOC O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O
Some Arab countries also want to play a role in the stability operation in Iraq but are reluctant to send troops because of political , religious and ethnic considerations , the official said .	B-GPE I-GPE|U-PER L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O
Countries in the Gulf Cooperation Council have offered to donate money for the effort .	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-ORG I-GPE|I-ORG I-GPE|I-ORG L-GPE|L-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Rumsfeld also met Friday with King Abdullah of Jordan , an American ally in the Middle East .	U-PER O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O
Defense officials say Jordan provided key help in the Iraq war , acting as a staging area for U . S . special operations raids into western Iraq to prevent missiles from being fired at Jordan or Israel .	B-PER|U-ORG L-PER O U-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-ORG|B-GPE I-GPE|I-ORG|I-GPE I-GPE|I-ORG|L-GPE I-GPE|I-ORG I-GPE|I-ORG I-GPE|L-ORG I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-LOC I-GPE|L-LOC I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-WEA I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O
Rumsfeld did not say what the two discussed .	U-PER O O O O B-PER L-PER O O
Spanish police intercept 33 exhausted Africans trying to enter Spain	O O O O O O O O O O
MADRID , Spain ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
Police intercepted 33 African immigrants who came ashore Thursday in southern Spain aboard an overcrowded boat , including several pregnant women and other travelers suffering from hypothermia , police said .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-LOC I-PER|L-LOC I-PER I-PER|B-VEH I-PER|I-VEH I-PER|L-VEH I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O U-PER O O
Spanish media showed dramatic photos of police struggling to carry women on the verge of fainting after they were found wandering through Tarifa , Spain ' s windswept southern tip , Civil Guard officials told Spanish news agencies .	B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O U-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|B-GPE|U-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O B-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O
Police also arrested two Moroccan men suspected of trafficking in human beings and navigating the Zodiac boat across from Africa , Efe said . Twenty - six of the would - be immigrants were from sub - Saharan Africa , six of them women , and the other seven were males from North African countries , police said . Red Cross officials administered first aid on the scene , and the detainees were taken to a processing center for the government to begin expulsion proceedings .	B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O B-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O
Tens of thousands of destitute Africans try to enter Spain illegally each year by crossing the perilous Strait of Gibraltar to reach the southern mainland or by sailing northwest to the Canary Islands out in the Atlantic . Court suspends independent paper for publishing letters deemed religiously inflammatory	O O O O O O O O O O
KHARTOUM , Sudan ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
A state security court suspended a newspaper critical of the government Saturday after convicting it of publishing religiously inflammatory material , the newspaper ' s lawyer said .	B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-GPE L-ORG|L-GPE O O O U-ORG O O O O O O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER L-PER O O
The Khartoum Monitor may not appear for two months and must pay a fine of 1 million Sudanese pounds ( about US $ 400 ) , lawyer Ngor Olang Ngor told The Associated Press .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
Failure to pay the fine would result in a two - month extension of the suspension .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The sentence was the latest in a series of state actions against the Monitor , the only English language daily in Sudan and a leading critic of conditions in the south of the country , where a civil war has been waged for 20 years .	O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O B-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-GPE O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC|B-GPE I-ORG|I-LOC|L-GPE I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC|U-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC L-ORG|L-LOC O
Ngor said the paper would pay the fine but it would also appeal the verdict .	U-PER O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O
The court ruling stated that the verdict and sentence would be submitted to the National Press Council , a government - appointed body , for approval , Ngor said .	O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-PER O O
The secretary general of the National Press Council , Hashim el - Jazz , did not answer repeated calls to his cell phone on Saturday .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
The court convicted the paper of violating article 25 of the Press Law , which prohibits the publication of material that defames religion or incites religiously unacceptable activity .	B-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The charges arose from letters - to - the - editor published last month that dealt with religion .	O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O
One letter claimed that alcohol was not prohibited by Islam .	O O O O O O O O O O O
Earlier this week , security police detained the Monitor ' s managing editor , Nhial Bol , for 24 hours .	O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O
On his release , he was charged with incitement of public discord for publishing the letters .	O U-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
Sudan has an Islamic - orientated government and a substantial Christian minority .	U-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER L-PER O
In a separate action against the Monitor , security officials went to its editorial offices on Thursday night and told the management that it was being closed until it paid a fine of 15 million Sudanese pounds ( about US $ 6 , 000 ) that was outstanding from a court conviction last year .	O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O B-PER L-PER O O B-FAC|U-ORG I-FAC L-FAC O O O O O B-PER L-PER O U-ORG O O O O U-ORG O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O
The Monitor did not appear Friday and its offices were closed .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O B-FAC|U-ORG L-FAC O O O
In last year ' s trial , the paper was convicted of defaming the government for publishing that trains running to and from southern Sudan were used to transport abducted women and children . North Korea ' s military may have fired a laser at a U . S . helicopter in March , a U . S . official said Tuesday , as the communist state ditched its last legal obligation to keep itself free of nuclear weapons . Israeli troops kill Palestinian boy and injure two other children in West Bank violence	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
JERUSALEM ( AP )	U-GPE O U-ORG O
Israeli troops shot and killed a 16 - year - old Palestinian boy and critically injured two children , ages 7 and 9 , during conflicts in the West Bank that erupted Tuesday as Israeli and Palestinian leaders moved toward talks on a new Mideast peace plan .	B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O B-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O O O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O U-GPE O O O
The shootings _ which the Israeli army said came in response to attacks by Palestinians throwing stones and molotov cocktails _ came a day after Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon declared that Israel ' s occupation in the West Bank must end , stunning both dovish opponents and hardline allies .	O O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-WEA I-PER I-PER|B-WEA L-PER|L-WEA O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-GPE O O O O B-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O

A summit between Sharon and his Palestinian counterpart , Mahmoud Abbas , had been planned for Wednesday but was postponed , according to Israeli and Palestinian officials , who blamed each other for the delay . U . S . lawmaker : North Korea says it will produce more nukes	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
SEOUL , South Korea ( AP )	O O O O O O O
North Korea has told American lawmakers it already has nuclear weapons and intends to build more , a senior U . S . congressman said Monday after returning from a trip to the communist state .	B-GPE L-GPE O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER U-GPE O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O U-WEA O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O
` ` They admitted to having nuclear capability and weapons at this moment , ' ' said Rep . Curt Weldon , who headed a delegation of U . S . lawmakers that visited Pyongyang for three days ending Sunday .	O O U-GPE O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O
` ` They admitted to an effort to expand their nuclear production program . ' '	O O U-GPE O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O
Weldon ' s comments echoed those of U . S . officials following talks in Beijing in April .	U-PER O O O O O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O U-GPE O O O
They said that North Korea claimed during a pause in the formal talks that it already had nuclear weapons , but would give up the program in return for economic aid and security guarantees .	U-PER O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Weldon said at a news conference in Seoul that North Korean Vice Foreign Minister Kim Kye Gwan repeated that claim during a dinner meeting .	U-PER O O O O O O U-GPE O B-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O
Both Kim and Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun told Weldon that Pyongyang planned to produce more nuclear weapons and had nearly finished reprocessing the spent nuclear fuel rods needed to do so , despite pressure from the United States and its allies . 2 member of a U . S . House panel that oversees the armed forces .	O O O B-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O

` ` Certainly what we know suggests that we should take what they ( North Korean officials ) are saying very seriously , ' ' he said at a news conference in Seoul .	O O O O U-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-PER|L-GPE L-PER|L-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-GPE O
Weldon said his delegation ` ` comes away convinced ' ' that the nuclear standoff can be resolved in a peaceful manner that allows Pyongyang ' s communist regime to stand while removing its nuclear threats .	U-PER O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O U-GPE O O O
Roh issued a similar message during a nationally televised news conference .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
` ` South Korea and the United States share a firm principle that North Korea should never possess nuclear weapons and that the issue should be resolved through a peaceful manner , ' ' he said .	O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
Roh spoke after meeting the U . S . lawmakers and Wolfowitz , who also arrived in Seoul on Sunday for a two - day visit to discuss North Korea .	U-PER O O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O U-PER O U-PER O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
Wolfowitz said Saturday in Singapore that Washington hoped putting pressure on North Korea ' s battered economy would resolve the nuclear standoff .	U-PER O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O
On Monday , Wolfowitz stressed that military readiness was just as important .	O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O
In meetings with South Korean officials , Wolfowitz urged them to increase military spending on new technologies and telecommunications equipment , as U . S . forces have done .	O O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|L-GPE L-PER O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|I-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O O O
South Korea earmarks about US $ 14 . 5 billion for its military .	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O
` ` They still work with paper and pencil instead of with the kind of modern communications gear that our special forces took with them to Afghanistan , ' ' Wolfowitz said .	O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O U-GPE O O O U-PER O O
He said upgrades would allow troops to react quicker to threats from the North and help reduce the possibility of a military conflict on the peninsula , not heighten it .	U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O O O O O
The nuclear crisis flared last October when U . S . officials said North Korea admitted running a secret nuclear weapons program in violation of a 1994 accord with Washington .	O O O O O O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O U-GPE O
State refused bid to prosecute acquitted apartheid germ warfare head	O O O O O O O O O O
BLOEMFONTEIN , South Africa ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-GPE L-GPE|L-GPE O U-ORG O
South Africa ' s Supreme Court of Appeal ruled Tuesday against a state request to retry the head of apartheid ' s germ warfare program , once accused of plotting to poison Nelson Mandela .	B-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-GPE O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-WEA I-PER|L-WEA I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER L-PER|L-PER O
Wouter Basson was acquitted in April 2002 on 46 charges , ranging from murder and drug trafficking to fraud and theft .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Basson was accused of directing South Africa ' s former apartheid regime ' s biochemical efforts aimed at destroying its opponents .	U-PER O O O O B-ORG|B-GPE I-ORG|L-GPE I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER|U-ORG L-PER O
The ruling by judges Piet Streicher and Mohamed Navsa of the Supreme Court of Appeal , the highest appeals court in the country , means that Basson cannot be tried again and his acquittal stands , the South African Press Association reported .	O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG|B-GPE L-PER|L-PER|L-ORG|L-GPE O O O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O
The state ' s appeal was based on the judge refusing to recuse himself during Basson ' s 2 1 / 2 - year trial .	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O
The prosecution alleged presiding Judge Willie Hartzenberg favored Basson .	B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O
The appeal judges found Hartzenberg ' s refusal did not relate to an error of law on his part .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
Basson headed a program named Project Coast in the 1980 ' s .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
During the trial witnesses testified that the project involved trying to create deadly bacteria and anti - fertility drugs that would only affect blacks .	O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O
They poisoned opponents ' clothing and stockpiled cholera , HIV and anthrax .	U-PER O U-PER O O O O U-WEA O U-WEA O U-WEA O
The alleged intended victims included former President Nelson Mandela and several African National Congress leaders who are now high - ranking government officials .	B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-GPE L-PER|L-PER O
He had also been accused of siphoning millions of dollars from Project Coast to finance a lavish , globe - trotting lifestyle and of selling drugs .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O O
( sapa - es - dk )	O O O O O O O
Mars rover is launched on voyage to look for evidence of water	O O O O O O O O O O O O
CAPE CANAVERAL , Florida ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
A rocket holding the first of two Mars rovers blasted off Tuesday on a seven - month voyage to the red planet where the golf - cart - sized vehicles will search for evidence that there was once enough water to support life on Mars .	B-VEH I-VEH I-VEH I-VEH|B-VEH I-VEH|I-VEH I-VEH|I-VEH I-VEH|I-VEH|B-VEH I-VEH|I-VEH|I-VEH|U-LOC L-VEH|L-VEH|L-VEH O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|U-LOC I-LOC|B-VEH I-LOC|I-VEH|B-VEH I-LOC|I-VEH|I-VEH I-LOC|I-VEH|L-VEH I-LOC|I-VEH I-LOC|I-VEH I-LOC|L-VEH I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC|U-LOC O
The rover named Spirit lifted off from the Cape Canaveral Air Force Station aboard a Boeing Delta II rocket at 1 : 58 p . m . ( 1758 GMT ) .	B-VEH I-VEH I-VEH L-VEH|U-VEH O O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O B-VEH I-VEH|U-ORG I-VEH|B-VEH I-VEH|L-VEH L-VEH O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Thunderstorms delayed the launch by two days , and launch officials contended with a last - minute communications glitch between stations that will track the spacecraft .	O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC|U-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-VEH L-FAC|L-VEH O
The second rover , named Opportunity , will be launched later this month , and both are expected to arrive at Mars in January .	B-VEH I-VEH I-VEH I-VEH I-VEH L-VEH|U-VEH O O O O O O O O O U-VEH O O O O O U-LOC O O O
Moving on six wheels , the $ 800 million rovers act as robotic geologists .	O O O O O B-VEH I-VEH I-VEH I-VEH L-VEH O O B-VEH L-VEH O
Each is equipped with a panoramic camera , a camera for close - up views of rocks and a drill to cut into rocks .	U-VEH O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The data will be transmitted back to Earth .	O O O O O O O U-LOC O
Previous missions have shown Mars had water in the past , but scientists want to find out how long the water was there and in what quantities .	O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O O
Scientists believe the water may show that Mars once was able to support life .	U-PER O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O
The rovers ' landing sites , on opposite sides of the planet , were chosen for their likelihood of holding evidence of water .	B-LOC|B-VEH I-LOC|L-VEH I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|B-LOC L-LOC|L-LOC O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O
Studying the minerals in rocks can tell scientists how the rocks were formed , whether they were ever submerged in water , and whether hot water ever ran over them .	O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The rovers are expected to travel up to 132 feet ( 39 . 6 meters ) each Martian day , which is 24 hours and 39 { minutes long .	B-VEH L-VEH O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O
The missions are expected to last three months but could run longer .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The rovers eventually will shut down as dust builds up on their solar panels and they will remain on the planet .	B-VEH L-VEH O O O O O O O O O U-VEH O O O U-VEH O O O B-LOC L-LOC O
Only 12 out of 30 previous attempts have reached Mars , and only three out of nine attempts have succeeded in landing on the planet .	O O O O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC O
NASA revamped its Mars program after the failure of two unmanned missions to Mars four years ago .	U-ORG O U-ORG U-LOC O O O O O O O O O U-LOC O O O O
The space agency has been under intense scrutiny since February when the space shuttle Columbia disintegrated over Texas , killing all seven crew members .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O B-VEH|B-VEH I-VEH|I-VEH I-VEH|L-VEH L-VEH O O U-GPE O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
A logo patch of that last Columbia mission was attached to both Mars rovers .	O O O O O O U-VEH O O O O B-VEH I-VEH|U-LOC L-VEH O

ATHENS , Greece ( AP )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O U-ORG O
A retired navy officer facing life in prison over a failed effort to protect Kurdish rebel leader Abdullah Ocalan , told a court Thursday he felt remorse for his part in the 1999 plot .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-FAC I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O B-ORG L-ORG O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O O

Naxakis is one of 13 people on trial for bringing the fugitive guerrilla leader to Greece .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER|U-GPE O

Naxakis and two of Ocalan ' s Kurdish associates are being tried on criminal charges of endangering national security .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-GPE L-PER|L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
Ocalan , being tried in absentia , was indicted for entering the country illegally , a misdemeanor .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O
Ocalan , leader of the Kurdistan Workers Party , or PKK , is serving a life sentence in Turkey for leading a 15 - year insurgency against the country that left 37 , 000 people dead . U . S . LIKELY TO WAIT , REGROUP BEFORE ATTACKING BAGHDAD	O O O O O O O O O O O O
04 - 03 - 03 02 : 16 : 00EST	O O O O O O O O O O
By EDWARD EPSTEIN	O O O
c . 2003 SAN FRANCISCO CHRONICLE	O O O O O O
WASHINGTON _ Having punched through severely depleted Republican Guard divisions that formed Baghdad ' s outer defensive ring , U . S . Army and Marine forces are likely to pause again to test the Iraqi capital ' s inner defenses and waall but evaporated under the weight of the U . S . assault .	U-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-ORG|B-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG|I-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG|L-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O
Their collapse left the U . S . troops less than 20 miles from Saddam Hussein ' s capital .	U-PER O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O O O B-GPE|B-PER I-GPE|L-PER I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O
Bet ` fow Central Command chief Gen . Tommy Franks and his field commanders face a big decision _ whether to rush into the city of 5 million where Hussein ' s regime has gathered its most - trusted forces or wait and see if the war can be won without paying the price of street - to - street urban fighting .	O O O B-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|U-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-PER I-GPE|L-PER I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE|B-ORG|U-PER I-GPE|I-ORG I-GPE|I-ORG I-GPE|L-ORG I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-PER|U-ORG I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER L-GPE|L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-FAC O O O U-FAC O O O
` ` We are expectingn or at least planning for , a very difficult fight ahead , ' ' Gen . Stanley McChrystal said at the Pentagon Tuesday .	O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-FAC L-FAC O O
` ` We are not expecting to drive into Baghdad suddenly and seize it . ' '	O O U-ORG O O O O O O U-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O
Instead of an all - out assault , analysts expect the United States to follow the example of British forces outside the southern Iraqi city of Basra .	O O O O O O O O U-PER O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE|B-LOC I-PER|I-GPE|L-LOC I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE|U-GPE O
They are likely to mount small probing patrols into the city to determine the level of Iraqi resistance .	U-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O O
If these patrols meet little opposition , thousands of troops could rush into the city .	O B-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
If the Iraqis respond forcefully , the Army and Marine units could withdraw and await the 4th Mechanized Infantry Division , which will soon start moving north from Kuwait .	O B-GPE L-GPE O O O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG I-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O
While they wait , the forces would try to determine where Iraqi strong points are within the city and where Hussein might be , if he is still alive .	O U-PER O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-LOC I-LOC|U-PER I-LOC L-LOC O O U-PER O O O O
` ` The Basra model will work for a while , at least until you see problems with food and water for civilians in the city , ' ' said Lawrence Korb , an analyst at the Council on Foreign Relations who was assistant defense secretary under former President Ronald Reagan .	O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG U-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O
` ` Before going in ( with a full assault ) , you have to decide if it ' s worth the risks , and . . . you have to know who ' s there in the way of Iraqi forces and the amount of potential damage to civilians , ' ' he said .	O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O U-GPE O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O
The administration has said it wants to minimize casualties to Iraqi civilians , which makes the British experience around Basra instructive , the analysts said .	B-ORG L-ORG O O U-ORG O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O U-GPE O O U-GPE O O B-PER L-PER O O
The British have been outside the city of 1 . 5 million for more than a week .	B-PER L-PER O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|B-PER I-GPE|I-PER I-GPE|I-PER L-GPE|L-PER O O O O O O
Thousands of refugees have fled the city , apparently providing information to the British that has led to raids on military and Baath Party sites in the city .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-LOC|U-ORG I-LOC I-LOC|B-ORG I-LOC|L-ORG I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|B-GPE L-LOC|L-GPE O
` ` The key endgame may be whether the U . S . can parse out the key regime centers of power in Baghdad and attack them without having to fight into the city , or at least locate them well enough to atman of the Center for Strategic and International Studies said in his daily war report .	O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|U-ORG I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC|U-GPE O O U-LOC O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-LOC O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O U-PER O O O O
U . S . strategists say that Hussein , if he is still alive and in control of his forces , might like a bloody battle in Baghdad because such fighting could cause heavy U . S . casualties .	B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O
His last hope for survival might be that the United States loses its taste for such losses and forces President Bush to negotiate a compromise that would allow Hussein and his family to keep power in Baghdad .	U-PER O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O O O O U-GPE O
But Michael O ' Hanlon of the Brookings Institution in Washington said the apparent collapse of Republican Guard resistance could deprive Hussein of much of the wallop he was counting on in the city .	O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG|U-GPE O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
` ` If U . S . forces seriously degrade Iraq ' s half - dozen Republican Guard divisions before that final battle , and only have to face perhaps 30 , 000 Special Republican Guard , fedayeen , and related personnel , the task will not be as hard as it might have been , ' ' he said .	O O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER|L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
While two guard divisions have apparently been smashed , there are three others in the Baghdad area .	O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-LOC I-LOC|U-GPE L-LOC O
A sixth remains in northern Iraq .	B-PER L-PER O O B-LOC L-LOC O
Cordesman said it seems the guards have been reinforced by units from the regular Iraqi army , which is generally viewed as less reliable .	U-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|U-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O
This shows the Iraqi military ' s growing weakness , he said .	O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O O
` ` The Republican Guard has taken a massive hammering at every level and is now scattered and deploying somewhat erratically at the brigade level , ' ' he said .	O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O
The Iraqis still haven ' t used chemical weapons , even though many experts feared such attacks as the U . S . troops neared Baghdad .	B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O U-GPE O
Korb , who ' s convinced Hussein has stocks of chemical weapons he never reported to U . N . inspectors , said he wouldn ' t be surprised if Hussein tried to use them .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-WEA I-PER|L-WEA I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-WEA O
But he also said , ` ` He may destroy them to embarrass us , ' ' to show the world he never had such weapons and that Bush invaded for no reason other than aggression .	O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O U-WEA O O U-GPE O O O O O B-LOC L-LOC U-PER O O B-WEA L-WEA O O U-PER O O O O O O O O
The U . S . forces zeroing in on Baghdad _ the 1st Marine Division from the east and the Army ' s 3rd Mechanized Infantry Division _ are trained in urban warfare .	B-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-PER|L-ORG I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O O O O O O
But in such close - quarters fighting , they would lose much of the technological advantage of their air supremacy , which would have to be curtailed because bombing in a city can cause large civilian casualties . However , Baghdad from the air looks like Los Angeles _ wide , straight boulevards intersected by side streets in a grid pattern .	O O U-GPE O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-FAC I-FAC|L-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O
` ` Our forces would be capable of dealing with it reasonably .	O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O O

CIA SAYS NORTH KOREA HAS NEW NUCLEAR TESTING SITE AND TECHNOLOGY	O O O O O O O O O O O
WASHINGTON	U-GPE
U . S . intelligence officials now believe North Korea is developing the technology to make nuclear warheads small enough to fit atop the country ' s growing arsenal of missideS ( potentially putting Tokyo and U . S . troops based in Japan at risk , according to officials who have received the intelligence reports .	B-PER|B-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|L-GPE I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|L-ORG L-PER O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|B-WEA|B-GPE I-WEA|I-WEA|L-GPE I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA L-WEA|L-WEA|U-WEA O O O U-GPE O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-GPE O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
In the assessment , which they have shared with Japan , South Korea and other allies in recent weeks , officials at the Central Intelligence Agency said that U . S . satellites have identified a sophisticated new nuclear testing site in an area called Youngdoktong .	O O O O O U-PER O O O U-GPE O B-GPE L-GPE O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O B-FAC|B-GPE I-FAC|I-GPE I-FAC|L-GPE I-FAC L-FAC O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-LOC I-FAC|I-LOC I-FAC|I-LOC L-FAC|L-LOC|U-LOC O
At the site , equipment has been set up to test conventional explosives that , when detonated , could compress a plutonium core and set onfe nuclear explosion .	O B-FAC L-FAC O O O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|U-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O
[ oMa intelligence officials believe that the existence of the testing range is evidence that the country intends to manufacture much more sophisticated weapons that would be light enough to put onto its growing arsenal of medium - and long - range missiles .	O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|U-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|B-WEA|U-GPE I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|B-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA|I-WEA L-WEA|L-WEA|L-WEA O
Previously , U . S . officials had said they were uncertain whether North Korea had received enough outside technical help to even attempt to make such a ` ` miniaturized ' ' nuclear warhead .	O O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O
The new testing capability would suggest that the North Koreans are getting closer _ now , officials said , the intelligence reports say they could do in in as little as a year or less .	O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O
But officials say there is no sure way of knowing that they can until they actually test one .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O U-GPE O O U-WEA O
Senior administration officials say that Washington has been trying to convince Asiagent that it requires a unified diplomatic front to force the country to give up its weapons .	B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O O U-GPE O O O O O U-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O B-WEA|U-GPE L-WEA O
The new intelligence is apparently being marshaled to support the administration ' s argument .	O O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O
According to officials who have been briefed on the U . S . reports , conventional explosions simulating a nuclear detonation have been set off at the testing site , which is near North Korea ' s main nuclear complex .	O O B-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|U-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-FAC|B-GPE I-FAC|I-FAC|L-GPE I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC I-FAC|I-FAC L-FAC|L-FAC O
North Korea has never tested a nuclear weapon , though the CIA long ago estimated that it manufactured two crude devices in the late 1980s or early 1990s .	B-GPE L-GPE O O O B-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-GPE O B-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O
North Korea , unlike Iraq , has made no secret of its plan to develop nuclear weapons .	B-GPE L-GPE O O U-GPE O O O O O O U-GPE O O O B-WEA L-WEA O
Now , administration officials say they fear that the country is on the verge of producing five or six new weapons , some of which might be miniaturized . ` ` This would give them the range they never had before , and the chance to spread their threat far beyond South Korea , ' ' said one senior Asian official , noting that approximately 60 , 000 U . OPTIONAL MATERIAL FOLLOWS . )	O O O O O
U . S . satellites have been watching North Korean nuclear activity intently since late last year , when the North evicted international inspectors .	B-FAC|B-GPE I-FAC|I-GPE I-FAC|L-GPE I-FAC L-FAC O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-PER L-PER O
Those inspectors had stood guard over a collection of 8 , 000 spent nuclear fuel rods , which can be reprocessed into weapons - grade plutonium .	B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-WEA O O O O

It would take 1 , 000 to 1 , 500 rods to make enough plutonium for a weapon , experts say . O	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O U-PER O O O
` ` What we are told is that it would take perhaps six months after that to produce a miniaturized warhead , and put it into one of the missiles , ' ' said one senior official who has recently reviewed the intelligence . ` ` But after Iraq , who knows how good those estimates are ? ' '	O O O O U-GPE O U-PER O O O O O O O O O
After the claims made about prohibited weapons in Iraq , which have not been found so far , skepticism about the quality of U . S . intelligence is widespread .	O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|U-GPE I-WEA I-WEA|U-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O
And in the case of North Korea , as in Iraq , the immediacy of the threat depends on whose analysis seems most compelling .	O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
So far , U . S . intelligence has picked up almost no sign of the telltale krypton gas that is released into the atmosphere when nuclear fuel rods are converted into weapons - grade plutonium .	O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-WEA O O O O

Roundup : UK , US downplay divide on UN role in post - war Iraq	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
BELFAST , Britain , April 8 ( Xinhua )	B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
A two - day summit between British Prime Minister Tony Blair and US President George W . Bush ended here Tuesday with both countries trying to minimize splits on UN role in rebuilding Iraq after the ongoing US - led war against the country is over .	O O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-GPE O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O U-GPE O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O

After the Camp David talks , Blair , who analysts say has been pursuing a special relationship with Washington in order to restore Britain ' s traditional role as a transatlantic " bridge " , was forced to readjust his tone .	O O B-FAC L-FAC O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE O O O O O O U-PER O O
Blair and Bush were expected to bridge their gap on the issue by reaching an agreement on UN role in post - war Iraq , some analysts said even before this summit at Hillsborough , south of Belfast , the second of its kind since the war broke out on March 20 .	U-PER O U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In a joint written statement , the two allies pledged to seek UN Security Council resolutions to affirm Iraq ' s territorial integrity , ensure aid delivery and endorse an " appropriate " post - conflict administration for Iraq .	O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O B-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-GPE O
" We welcome the appointment by the United Nations Secretary - General of a special adviser for Iraq to work with the people of Iraq and coalition representatives , " the statement added .	O U-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|L-ORG I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|L-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-GPE L-PER|L-PER O O O O O O
The United Nations would have a " vital role " in the effort to repair Iraq ' s infrastructure , Blair told reporters at a news conference after his talks with Bush , downplaying UN role in emphasizing that ultimately the country must be run by the Iraqi people .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O U-PER O O U-ORG O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
" The key is that Iraq in the end should be governed by the Iraqi people , " Blair said , pledging that British and US forces would not stay in the country " a day longer than necessary " .	O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O U-PER O O O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O
It was a " false choice " to debate whether Iraq should be run by coalition forces or the United Nations , said Blair , who was believed to be in favor of a stronger UN role in post - conflict Iraq than Bush .	O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-ORG I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER L-PER|U-PER O
Echoing Blair , Bush said the UN would play a role in all aspects of post - war Iraq , from humanitarian aid to a future interim authority , adding that Iraq would " move as quickly as possible " to an interim authority made up of Iraqis from inside and outside the country .	O U-PER O U-PER O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|B-GPE L-ORG|L-PER|L-GPE O
However , when pressed on what precisely the UN role would be , Bush on Tuesday mentioned only humanitarian work , " suggesting " people to staff the interim authority and helping Iraq " progress . "	O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG L-PER|L-ORG O O U-GPE O O O O
" When we say vital role for the United Nations , we mean vital role for the United Nations in all aspects of the issue , whether it be humanitarian aid , or whether it be helping to stand up an interim authority .	O O U-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
The Iraqi people will decide who ' s on the Iraqi interim authority , " said Bush .	B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O U-PER O O O B-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG L-ORG O O O U-PER O
Bush did not spell out how much power the United Nations would have , nor did he elaborate on Washington ' s plans to place US officials alongside Iraqis in the interim administration .	U-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O U-PER O O U-GPE O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O U-PER O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O
Differences still remain between the United States and Britain , analysts said , over the speed with which Iraq should be handed to an interim Iraqi administration , and the extent to which a US - led group of generals and former diplomats should effectively run the country .	O O O O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O U-PER O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER L-PER|L-PER O O O B-GPE L-GPE O
Yet , analysts argued , both Britain and the United States hope their agreed vision of a postwar scenario will placate anti - war nations such as France , Germany and Russia .	O O U-PER O O O U-GPE O B-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O U-GPE O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE L-GPE|U-GPE O
" We will move as quickly as possible to place governmental responsibilities under the control of an interim authority composed of Iraqis from both inside and outside the country , " Bush vowed at the joint news conference with Blair , adding that the interim authority would serve until a permanent government could be chosen by the Iraqi people .	O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|B-GPE L-ORG|L-PER|L-GPE O O U-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
" Rebuilding of Iraq will require the support and expertise of the international community .	O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O
We are committed to working with international institutions , including the United Nations , which will have a vital role to play in this task , " Bush added .	U-GPE O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O U-PER O O
Blair also pleaded the world to avoid " endless diplomatic wrangles " over the future of Iraq like the international dispute over a second UN resolution on Iraq that preceded the war .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O U-ORG O O U-GPE O O O O O
France and Germany , which were most vocal in opposing this US - led war against Iraq , have been insisting that the United Nations should play a central role in the phase of post - war Iraq .	B-GPE|B-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE I-GPE|I-GPE L-GPE|L-GPE|U-GPE O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O
On the unresolved dispute between Europe and the United States , analysts say , Blair might again have to make a difficult choice , but he is very likely to support the United States , which Britain can not afford to fall out with . hka - - Macao traces passengers on flight with suspected SARS infector	O O O O O O O O O O O O
MACAO , April 16 ( Xinhua )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Four Macao residents have been notified by the Health Services that they shared the same plane with a Taiwanese suspected to have contracted Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome ( SARS ) on April 8 .	B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-PER O B-VEH I-VEH L-VEH O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Health Services urged the four residents to contact the authority immediately to report their health condition .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-PER O O O
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ) guidelines for suspected cases , these four residents need not to be isolated , however , they should seek treatment immediately if they have any SARS symptoms .	O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
In order to improve the epidemic control , Secretary for Social Affairs and Culture Chui Sai On , who has been named director of the SARS task force by the government , has designated representatives from the Health Services and the Center for Disease Prevention and Control to visit neighboring Guangdong Province on Thursday , to learn from Guangdong ' s experience and know - how in combating SARS , which have been acknowledged by WHO . JAKARTA , April 23 ( Xinhua )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
The Central Jakarta District Court began Wednesday the trial of Muslim cleric Abu Bakar Ba ' asyir who has been in custody since last October on charges of treason and immigration offenses .	B-ORG I-ORG|B-LOC I-ORG|I-LOC I-ORG|L-LOC L-ORG O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O

He is also charged with immigration offenses for having a Malaysian citizenship since 1993 .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O
Seven prosecutors read in turn the indictment against Ba ' asyir at the makeshift court room in the Meteorology and Geophysics Agency ' s office in Central Jakarta . Police believed Ba ' asyir was the spiritual leader of Jemaah Islamiyah , the terrorist network in Southeast Asia which is widely blamed for the Bali bombing . The Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia ( FARC ) said Monday that it was prepared to exchange prisoners with the government despite the death of 10 hostages held by the rebel group . The Philippine Presidential Palace Friday dismissed as an " old tune " deposed leader Joseph Estrada ' s claim that he was still the country ' s legitimate president . PRAGUE , June 9 ( Xinhua )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Czech President Vaclav Klaus on Monday appointed Miroslav Kostelka as the country ' s new defense minister to replace Jaroslav Tvrdik who resigned from the post in late May .	B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER|B-GPE I-PER|L-GPE I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O

Kostelka , 52 , was first deputy defense minister and an ex - general .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
At the end of last month , Tvrdik submitted his resignation in protest against planned cuts in defense spending as part of the government ' s finance reforms .	O O O O O O O U-PER O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O
Under the planned package of public finance reforms , only 2 . 05 percent of the country ' s gross domestic product ( GDP ) will be allocated for the defense budget .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Tvrdik said the military reform could not be completed thoroughly with so little money .	U-PER O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
Tvrdik , who took over the defense ministry in May 2001 , also announced that he would quit his post in the parliament and give up his position in the ruling party Social Democrats . LUXEMBOURG , June 16 ( Xinhua )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
Foreign ministers of the European Union ( EU ) said here Monday that they fully supported stricter nuclear inspections of Iran ' s nuclear programs by the International Atomic Energy Agency ( IAEA ) .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE I-PER|I-GPE L-PER|L-GPE|U-GPE O O U-GPE O O U-PER O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-ORG O O
A statement issued at the two - day meeting of the EU foreign ministers called on Iran to conclude and implement urgently and unconditionally an additional protocol to the Nuclear Non - Proliferation Treaty allowing for short - notice inspections of suspected nuclear sites in the country .	O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE I-PER L-PER O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|B-GPE L-LOC|L-GPE O

" This would be a significant step in demonstrating Iran ' s stated peaceful intentions with regard to its nuclear program , " the seven - point statement said .	O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O
George Papandreou , foreign minister of Greece , the current holder of the EU presidency , said he was in personal contact with IAEA Director - General Mohamed ElBaradei and would follow his lead on this matter . China to build nuclear - powered desalinator project	O O O O O O O O
JINAN , June 24 ( Xinhua )	U-GPE O O O O U-ORG O
China late this year will start building a nuclear - powered desalinator project in Yantai City in east China ' s Shandong Province , with a designed capacity of producing 52 million tons of fresh water a year .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-GPE|B-LOC I-GPE|L-LOC I-GPE I-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .	B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|B-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-GPE|U-GPE I-PER|I-ORG|I-GPE L-PER|L-ORG|L-GPE O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-GPE L-GPE O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|B-GPE I-LOC|I-GPE L-LOC|L-GPE O
Yantai and other parts of Shandong suffered acute water shortages due to droughts in recent years , changing climate and other reasons .	U-GPE O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC|U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Approved by the State Development and Reform Commission , the project is expected to cost 1 . 6 billion yuan ( nearly 200 million US dollars ) .	O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O O
Zhang Zuoyi , director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University , was quoted in Monday ' s Beijing Evening News as saying the fresh water to be produced from the project will cost 3 . 75 yuan per ton , much less than the cost of water from existing sources .	B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG I-PER|I-ORG|B-ORG L-PER|L-ORG|L-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

The project would be completed and operational in 2007 , it said .	O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O

[ applause ] d the extra $ 400 per child to american families this year , 2003 . all together these tax reductions will help 92 million americans .	O O O O O O O O O U-PER O B-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O

a family of four with an income of $ 40 , 000 would receive a 96 % reduction in federal income taxes .	B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
instead of paying $ 1 , 178 per year , the family would pay $ 45 a year .	O O O O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O
[ applause ] that means extra money in the family budget year after year .	O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
that money can cover a lot of bills .	O O O O O O O O O
that money can help families with purchases they have been delaying .	O O O O U-PER O O U-PER O O O O
that money will be in circulation , which will be good for our economy .	O O O O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O O
[ applause ] and this plan will help our small business sector .	O O O O O O O O B-ORG|U-GPE I-ORG|B-ORG I-ORG|L-ORG L-ORG O
the benefits of the growth plan will come from uncreased consumer spending and , as importantly , from a lower income tax rates on the small businesses themselves .	O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-ORG O
it is important for our fellow citizens to understand that most small businesses pay their business taxes at the individual rates .	O O O O B-GPE|U-GPE I-GPE L-GPE O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O U-ORG U-ORG O O B-PER L-PER O O
most small businesses are sole proprietorships , limited partnerships , are subchapter ss , and , therefore , when you reduce individual tax rates , you benefit small business formation .	B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O B-ORG L-ORG O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O U-PER O B-ORG L-ORG O O

which leaves more money for investment , more money for growth , more money for job creation .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
a growing economy also needs small business investment .	O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O
and our tax code should encourage investment .	O U-GPE O O O O O O
today a small business can deduct a maximum of $ 25 , 000 in the year in which they buy equipment .	O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O
we need to triple the amount that can be deducted in the year in which they buy equipment .	U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O
[ applause ] so i propose to congress that they ought to limit - - limit ought to be increased to $ 75 , 000 and that limit ought to be indexed to inflation .	O O O O U-PER O O U-ORG O U-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

October ' s Last Weekend	O O O O O
Again I apologize for the lack of updates over the past few days and will use this space to recap a weekend that was both good and bad .	O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Good :	O O O
On Friday a small group of friends and I attended a most - righteous Sister Hazel concert at Floyd ' s Music Store for the third straight , and for the third straight year I was blown away by one of my favorite live bands .	O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER|U-PER O U-PER O O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O B-FAC I-FAC I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-ORG|U-PER I-ORG|I-ORG I-ORG|I-ORG L-ORG|L-ORG O
Sister Hazel has a way of becoming intimate with the fans by brining them into the show .	B-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O O
It ' s something you can always expect from these guys , unlike so many other performers , and is why I never miss a show when they ' re in town .	O O O O U-PER O O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O U-ORG O O O U-GPE O
On Saturday we hosted what was for the most part a largely successful Halloween party - - save for the fake blood stains on the carpet and bathroom walls , a couple beer spills , unnecessary fights and the expected trashing of the kitchen and living room areas .	O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-FAC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-FAC I-FAC|U-FAC I-FAC I-FAC|B-FAC I-FAC|L-FAC L-FAC O
Naturally , I dressed up as Hugh Hefner and took the role of making sure everyone was having a good time .	O O U-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O
I have yet to hear any complaints from any of the guests .	U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER L-PER|L-PER O
The Bad :	O O O
On Saturday the Seminoles were bested by unranked Maryland ; effectively ending our chances at a national title this year .	O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O B-ORG L-ORG O O O U-ORG O O O O O O O O
In addition , the quarterback controversy has once again debouched as Chris Rix almost took us to victory with his deep threat .	O O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O U-ORG O O O U-PER O O O
Alas , too little too late was the case thanks to the inept Wyatt Sexton who has been our starter since replacing Rix earlier in the season .	O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
Fortunately the agony of defeat was blanketed somewhat by our Halloween party and I won ' t have to worry about Seminole Football until next Saturday .	O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O O O U-ORG O O O O O
On Sunday we saw " Saw " ( review coming ) and as expected I was less than satisfied .	O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
It was neither better nor worse than last week ' s " The Grudge " but the trailers beforehand dictate that the end of this year and the beginning of 2005 will bring us a large quantity of horror movies .	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O

From Reuters : U . S . Of course the anti - American world press is jumping all over this story , casually omitting the fact that just a day earlier the marine in question lost a fellow soldier who was attending to a dead insurgent that was booby - trapped with explosives . For that I believe the Marines should handle dead and wounded insurgents by any means necessary to ensure their own safety and prevent a possible ambush .	O O U-PER O B-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O
I ' m no fan of this war either , but it irks me to no end reading and listening to civilian opinions on how soldiers should conduct themselves in hostile war zones from their comfortable recliners . Not to be Ignored	O O O O
More than a few e - mails have come in wondering why I haven ' t remarked on the horrible hunting tragedy on Nov . 21 that left six people dead , and why I haven ' t updated the ASSAULT WEAPONS BAN COUNTER . As this article points out , the SKS wasn ' t included on the list of banned weapons as part of the 10 - year ban on certain " assault weapons " signed by President Clinton .	O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O O O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O

Life - Saving Disease	O O O O
Here ' s an incredible story about an unsung hero until now .	O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O
From BBC News : A retired Italian doctor has revealed for the first time how he invented a fictitious disease which fooled the Nazis during World War II .	O B-ORG L-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O
The trick of prescribing Jews with a mysterious illness terrified the Nazis and saved 45 Roman Jews .	O O O O U-PER O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O
Dr Vittorio Sacerdoti has told his remarkable tale on the 60th anniversary of liberation of Rome .	B-PER I-PER L-PER O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-GPE O
Just 28 years old at the time , he used courage and ingenuity to save 45 people from certain death .	O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O
As other Jews were being rounded up , Dr Sacerdoti admitted anyone who could reach the hospital as patients - and diagnosed them with a dangerous disease .	O B-PER L-PER O O O O O B-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-FAC L-PER|L-FAC O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O
" We would write on their medical forms that the patient was suffering from K Syndrome , " he said .	O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O O
" We called it K after the German commander Kesserling - the Nazis thought it was cancer or tuberculosis , and they fled like rabbits . "	O U-PER O O O O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|U-GPE I-PER|L-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O
K Syndrome saved his cousin , Luciana Sacerdoti , who was just 10 years old .	O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O U-PER O O O O O O
" The day the Nazis came to the hospital , someone came to our room and said : ' You have to cough , you have to cough a lot because they are afraid of the coughing , they don ' t want to catch an awful disease and they won ' t enter ' . "	O O O B-PER L-PER O O B-FAC L-FAC O U-PER O O B-FAC|U-PER L-FAC O O O O U-PER O O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O

Mass Child Killer Gets New Trial	O O O O O O
Feminists have a reason to celebrate today as an appeals court just threw out the convictions of their martyr , Andrea Yates , by ruling that one of the prosecutor ' s expert witnesses gave false testimony at her trial .	U-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O O O O O O B-PER|U-PER L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|B-PER|B-PER I-PER|I-PER|L-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER I-PER|I-PER L-PER|L-PER O O O O U-PER O O
Yates , in case you have forgotten , is the women from Texas who heinously drowned her five kids , aged 6 months to 7 years , one by one , in her bathtub . A House committee voted Wednesday to allow people to shoot to kill in self - defense if they are attacked " in any other place where he or she has a right to be . "	B-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG L-ORG O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O O O U-PER O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC|U-LOC I-LOC|U-PER I-LOC I-LOC|U-PER I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC L-LOC O O
Sponsored by Rep . Dennis Baxley , an Ocala Republican , the bill ( HB 249 ) passed 13 - 0 .	O O B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-GPE L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
State law defines deadly force as that which is likely to cause " death or great bodily harm , " such as firing a gun at a person or a vehicle .	U-GPE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O B-PER L-PER O B-VEH L-VEH O
Florida courts consider deadly force a last resort and have held that a person being attacked has the " duty to use every reasonable means to avoid the danger , including retreat , prior to using deadly force . "	B-ORG|U-GPE L-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But this legislation says a person who is under attack in a public place " has no duty to retreat . "	O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|B-LOC I-PER|I-LOC L-PER|L-LOC O O O O O O O O
" Law - abiding people should not be told that if they are attacked , they should turn around and run , " NRA lobbyist Marion Hammer told lawmakers .	O B-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O O O O O O B-PER|B-PER|U-ORG I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O
" This bill gives back rights that have been eroded and taken away by a judicial system that at times appears to give preferential treatment to criminals . "	O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|U-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG|U-PER O O
Baxley held up a stack of more than 800 e - mails from Floridians who he said have written him to support the bill .	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O
He said 62 House members , a majority , have endorsed his bill , and supporters include Attorney General Charlie Crist and groups representing Florida sheriffs , police chiefs and police officers .	U-PER O B-PER I-PER|U-ORG L-PER O B-PER L-PER O O O O O O O U-PER O B-PER|B-PER I-PER|L-PER I-PER L-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG|B-PER|B-PER|B-PER|U-GPE I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER I-ORG|I-PER|I-PER|I-PER|U-ORG L-ORG|L-PER|L-PER|L-PER O
Rep . Jeff Kottkamp , R - Cape Coral , said the bill reminded him of a sign he saw on a constituent ' s house while campaigning door - to - door .	B-PER|U-PER I-PER I-PER L-PER O U-PER O B-GPE L-GPE O O O O O U-PER O O O U-PER O O B-FAC|B-PER I-FAC|L-PER I-FAC I-FAC L-FAC O O O O O O O O
Kottkamp said the sign , next to a doorbell , showed a smoking . 44 - Magnum handgun and the words : " We don ' t dial 911 . "	U-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA I-WEA|B-WEA I-WEA|I-WEA I-WEA|L-WEA L-WEA O O O O O U-PER O O O O O O O
This is great news for Florida gun carriers because now to defend yourself you don ' t have to first make sure a " duty to retreat " is impossible .	O O O O O B-PER|U-GPE I-PER|U-WEA L-PER O O O O U-PER U-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Death by Assault Weapon	O O O O
164 days after the expiration of the federal " assault weapons " ban some lunatic opened fire with an AK - 47 outside a Texas courthouse .	O O O O O O O O O B-WEA L-WEA O O B-PER L-PER O O O B-WEA I-WEA I-WEA L-WEA O B-FAC I-FAC|U-GPE L-FAC O
A brave civilian with a concealed weapons permit tried to stop him but was gunned down by David Hernandez Arroyo Sr , the scumbag who happened to be wearing body armor at the time and who also took out his ex - wife over a child support dispute . Should this be a call for more gun control ?	O O O O O O O U-WEA O O
Absolutely not .	O O O
This case tells us two things : that concealed weapons permit holders respond faster than police because we are in greater numbers , and that criminals wear body armor too - so it ' s ridiculous to claim that we should outlaw guns that are " too powerful " for civilian use . The Times , They Are a Changin '	O O O O O O O O
Speaking of major campaign contributors , here ' s the most interesting story to be culled from the Virginia Public Access Project .	O O B-PER I-PER L-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG L-ORG O

What ' s so special about Sheila Johnson ?	O O O O O O B-PER L-PER O

Johnson .
